message: I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. This way, you'll have more funds to deal with potential inflation.
I'll take 80, you can have 20, but let's make it a one-time deal to avoid future negotiations
Considering the impact of inflation, I suggest we divide the money equally. This ensures both of us have a stable amount to manage our resources effectively.
I'll take 85, you can have 15, but this is my final offer, don't expect me to negotiate further
